Including Code

Here is how we include a code snippet.

def show
    @widget = Widget(params[:id])
    respond_to do |format|
        format.html # show.html.erb
        format.json { render json: @widget }
    end
end

Maybe this works for python too?

def quadratic(x):
    ret = x**2
    return red
